name: Royal Spear
description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

passiveDescription.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>8%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
passiveDescription.1: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>10%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
passiveDescription.2: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
passiveDescription.3: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>14%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
passiveDescription.4: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>16%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
